trans-unit.source: Represents a control that creates a pop-up window that displays information for an element in the interface.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个控件，该控件可创建一个弹出窗口，以便在界面中显示元素的信息。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel).
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>，这意味着，它可以包含任何类型 （如字符串、 一个映像或一个面板） 的单个对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> 类。

trans-unit.source: You use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> control to provide information to the user.
trans-unit.target: 你使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>控制，以便向用户提供信息。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> to provide the name of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> or a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>提供的名称<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>。

trans-unit.source: The content of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> control can vary from a simple text string to more complex content such as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> that has embedded text and images.
trans-unit.target: 内容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>控件也有所不同的简单文本字符串到更复杂的内容如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>具有嵌入文本和图像。

trans-unit.source: The content of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> cannot receive focus.
A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> control cannot have a parent.

For example, you cannot set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> Instead, assign a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你不能设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>相反，分配<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>到<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> on multiple elements by defining a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>对通过定义的多个元素<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>中<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>。

trans-unit.source: The properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> class are used to define the position and behavior of the tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>类用于定义的位置和工具提示的行为。

trans-unit.source: Many of these properties are also defined in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> class.
trans-unit.target: 其中的许多属性中也定义<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>类。

trans-unit.source: If the value of one of these properties is specified by both the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> attached property, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> property is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个指定的其中一个属性的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>属性和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>的附加属性的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>使用属性。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> class provides properties to set timing behavior.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>类提供了用于设置计时行为的属性。

trans-unit.source: These attached properties are not included in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> class but can be used by the control.
trans-unit.target: 中不包括这些附加的属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>类，但可以使用由该控件。

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ToolTip Control
To apply the same property settings to multiple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要将相同的属性设置应用于多个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>控件，使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 你可以修改默认<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>提供独特外观的控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>, see [ToolTip Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/tooltip-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的部件和特定于状态<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>，请参阅[工具提示样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/tooltip-styles-and-templates.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 设置 visual 属性会仅造成影响该属性是否都存在于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>控件的默认模板，并通过设置。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following examples shows how to define a tooltip control for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> element.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何定义的工具提示控件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>元素。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to define a tooltip by assigning text to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何通过将文本分配给定义工具提示<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to define a tooltip by assigning a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> object to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何通过分配定义工具提示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>对象传递给<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses code to generate a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用代码生成<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>对象。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> (`tt`) and associates it with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> is closed and is no longer visible.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> 关闭并不再可见时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=nameWithType> event is also raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> control is closed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件也是时引发<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>控制处于关闭状态。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
Identifier field
Routing strategy
Bubbling
Delegate
The following example shows how to set an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Opened> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed> events.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置的事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Opened>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed>事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed" /> routed event.
Gets or sets the delegate handler method to use to position the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于定位 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> 的委托处理程序方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback" /> delegate method that provides placement information for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback" /> 提供位置信息的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> 委托方法。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Custom> for the callback delegate to be used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A>属性必须设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Custom>为要使用的回调委托。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback> delegate returns an array of possible points that are defined with respect to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementTarget%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback>委托返回的可能相对于定义的点数组<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementTarget%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> is displayed, a point is chosen that maximizes the amount of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> window that is visible.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>是显示，选中了一点来最大化量<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>是可见的窗口。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.CustomPopupPlacementCallback%2A> property and create the corresponding delegate.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.CustomPopupPlacementCallback%2A>属性并创建对应的委托。

trans-unit.source: The same technique is used to by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>, which is demonstrated in the [Popup Placement Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160032).
trans-unit.target: 通过使用相同的方法<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>，其中进行了演示[弹出窗口放置示例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160032)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.CustomPopupPlacementCallback" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control has a drop shadow.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个指示控件是否有投影的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control has a drop shadow; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件有投影，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> opens, the value is set to the value of <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
Setting this property to `true` has no effect if the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为`true`如果不起作用<xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性是`false`。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.HasDropShadow%2A> property for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.HasDropShadow%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>控件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.HasDropShadow" /> dependency property.
Get or sets the horizontal distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置目标原点与弹出项对齐点之间的水平距离。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: 目标原点与弹出项对齐点之间的水平距离。

trans-unit.source: For information about the target origin and popup alignment point, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关目标原点和弹出项对齐点的信息，请参阅[弹出项放置行为](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.

You can position a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以定位<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementTarget%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementRectangle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.HorizontalOffset%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.VerticalOffsetProperty>属性。

trans-unit.source: These properties behave the same as they do for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example shows how to create and position a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建和定位<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.HorizontalOffset" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> is visible.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> 是否可见的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> 可见，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.IsOpen" /> dependency property.
The event information.
Responds to the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed" /> event.
The old value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> property.
The new value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> property.
Called when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> 属性更改时调用。

trans-unit.source: Creates the implementation of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> 实现。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ToolTipAutomationPeer" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> control.
The event information.
Responds to the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Opened" /> event.
The previous visual parent.
Responds to a change in the visual parent of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" />.
trans-unit.target: 响应 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> 的可视父级的更改。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> becomes visible.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> 变得可见时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=nameWithType> event is also raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> control opens.
Routed Event Information
Identifier field
Routing strategy
Bubbling
Delegate
The following example shows how to set an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Opened> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed> events.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置的事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Opened>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed>事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Opened" /> routed event.

Gets or sets the orientation of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> control when it opens, and specifies how the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> control behaves when it overlaps screen boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> 控件打开时的方向，并指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> 控件在与屏幕边界重叠时的行为。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode" /> enumeration value that determines the orientation of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> control when it opens, and that specifies how the control interacts with screen boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode" /> 枚举值，用于确定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> 控件打开时的方向，并指定此控件如何与屏幕边界交互。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Mouse" />.

You can position a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以定位<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementTarget%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementRectangle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.HorizontalOffset%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.VerticalOffsetProperty>属性。

trans-unit.source: These properties behave the same as they do for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example shows how to create and position a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建和定位<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the rectangular area relative to which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> control is positioned when it opens.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> 控件打开时所在位置与之相关的矩形区域。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> structure that defines the rectangle that is used to position the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> 结构，该结构定义用于定位 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> 控件的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Empty" />.

You can position <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以定位<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementTarget%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementRectangle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.HorizontalOffset%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.VerticalOffsetProperty>属性。

trans-unit.source: These properties behave the same as they do for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example shows how to create and position a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建和定位<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementRectangle" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> relative to which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> is positioned when it opens.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />，当它打开时相对于它确定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> 的位置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is the logical parent of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 作为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 控件的逻辑父级的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.

You can position a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以定位<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementTarget%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementRectangle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.HorizontalOffset%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.VerticalOffsetProperty>属性。

trans-unit.source: These properties behave the same as they do for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example shows how to create and position a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建和定位<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementTarget" /> dependency property.

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an open <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> remains open until the user clicks the mouse when the mouse is not over the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示打开的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> 是否一直保持打开状态，直到用户在鼠标不在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> 上时单击鼠标。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> stays open until it is closed by the user clicking the mouse button outside the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> 一直保持打开状态，直到用户在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip" /> 之外单击鼠标按钮关闭它，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
A value of `false` for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.StaysOpen%2A> property is not supported for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> when it is not open.
trans-unit.target: 值为`false`为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.StaysOpen%2A>不支持属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>时未打开。

trans-unit.source: To create a tooltip that stays open until the mouse button is pressed when it is outside the tooltip, you must set both the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.StaysOpen%2A> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.IsOpen%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建外部工具提示时按下鼠标按钮前保持打开状态的工具提示，则必须同时设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.StaysOpen%2A>属性和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.IsOpen%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.StaysOpen%2A> is set to `false` when the tooltip is not open, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.StaysOpen%2A>设置为`false`时未打开，工具提示<xref:System.NotSupportedException>时发生。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Occurs when <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.StaysOpen" /> is set to <see langword="false" /> when a tooltip is not open.
trans-unit.target: 当没有打开工具提示且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.StaysOpen" /> 设置为 <see langword="false" /> 时发生。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.StaysOpen" /> dependency property.
Get or sets the vertical distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置目标原点与弹出项对齐点之间的垂直距离。

trans-unit.source: The vertical distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: 目标原点与弹出项对齐点之间的垂直距离。

trans-unit.source: For information about the target origin and popup alignment point, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关目标原点和弹出项对齐点的信息，请参阅[弹出项放置行为](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.

You can position a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以定位<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementTarget%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementRectangle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.HorizontalOffset%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.VerticalOffsetProperty>属性。

trans-unit.source: These properties behave the same as they do for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。

Metadata properties set to `true`

The following example shows how to create and position a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建和定位<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.VerticalOffset" /> dependency property.
